item.title: Caribbean Daily Brief â€“ February 14, 2026
item.description:
Valentine’s Day across the Caribbean: Mia Mottley is in love with winning, the US Navy is in love with shooting boats, and Trinidad’s PM is about to sweet-talk an energy conference. Let’s go.

ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡§ MIA MOTTLEY SWEEPS BARBADOS â€” AGAIN

Barbados Prime Minister Mia Mottley has won every single seat in Parliament â€” for the third consecutive election. She is now only the second Caribbean leader in history to achieve a 30-0 sweep three times, joining former Grenada PM Dr. Keith Mitchell.
